info.name: ExampleApp_QA
info.description:
ExampleApp_QA is a global collection that defines utility functions for requests in children folders.

Please go to **Pre-request Script** section to view what utility functions are provided.

item.name: template:%qa_name%

exec: // please copy&paste this authorization string from web console
// if you want to execute API requests on demo/prod
test_user_type: 00, // this value is where you define on your folder level, i.e. 00 means admin user and 01 means regular user
tmp_token: tmp_token, // this is only required when you need to execute API on demo or prod

request.description: A generic way to get ID token and set the value to collection variable called `id_token` .

exec: // Please deine your secret in global variables with naming convetion: secret_app-account-id
* define your data such as region, client_id and password per environment
* client_id may change depending on your user, you may update it accordingly
* define your user data per environment
* you can define your own test_user_type as the key:

request.description:
This is a setup script to set values for collection variables.

You can copy the list of polices that are returned from [previous request ](https://exampleapp-qa.postman.co/workspace/Mmc_QA_workspace~4c8eb547-75f3-4708-8698-1c565685cfea/request/30178757-61e642df-33eb-4bec-8c4a-d6f7d35175be?ctx=documentation) and paste it in Pre-request script section

exec: if (!policy_item) throw Error(`Unable to get the poicy ${poicy_name}`);

graphql.query:
query {
          listPolicyV2s {
            items {
              alertLevel
              appCategoryIds
              appIds
              applyAllUsers
              clipboardControl
              contentSharingTags
              description
              deviceType
              disablePolicyAt
              disableScreenshot
              documentAttributes
              events
              excludedTeamIds
              excludedUserIds
              fileSharingControl
              id
              identitySettings {
                enabled
                pattern
                type
              }
              logContent
              name
              permission
              permissionMessage
              resourceType
              status
              userIds
              watermarkSettings {
                enabled
                message
              }
              webCategoryIds
              createdAt
              updatedAt
              tenantId
            }
            total
          }
        }

query GetPolicyV2($id: ID!) {
  getPolicyV2(id: $id) {
    id
    status
    userIds
    teamIds
    appIds
    name
    description
    resourceType
    fileSharingControl
    logContent
    permission
    events
  }
}

fragment AppSettingFields on AppSettingType {
  apphost
  appinternalurl
  appport
  appprotocol
  azureAppId
  certificateLifetime
  dbName
  localport
  offline
#   sharedFolder
  source
  sourceproxyport
  sshAuthMethod
  sshPrivateKey
  sshUserName
  targetprotocol
  vaultServerId
}


query GetResourceEntry($id: ID!) {
    getResourceEntry(id: $id) {
    description
    id
    resname
    appsetting {
        ...AppSettingFields
    }
    permittedActions
    updatedAt
  }
}

query {
          listPolicyV2s {
            items {
              alertLevel
              appCategoryIds
              appIds
              applyAllUsers
              clipboardControl
              contentSharingTags
              description
              deviceType
              disablePolicyAt
              disableScreenshot
              documentAttributes
              events
              excludedTeamIds
              excludedUserIds
              fileSharingControl
              id
              identitySettings {
                enabled
                pattern
                type
              }
              inheritOriginalPolicyID
            #   limitFileContentSizeByte
            #   limitTextContentSizeByte
              logContent
              name
              permission
              permissionMessage
              resourceType
              status
              teamIds
              transitionSettings {
                applyAfterMS
                enabled
                permission
              }
              userIds
              watermarkSettings {
                enabled
                message
              }
              webCategoryIds
              createdAt
              updatedAt
              tenantId
            }
            total
          }
        }

graphql.query:
query ($id: String!) {
  getUserEntry(id: $id) {
    _idp_firstName
    _idp_lastName
    _idp_middleName
    _idp_phone
    _magicLink_password
    cognito_username
    forceUserResetPw
    id
    idp
    lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
    lastlogin
    mfaStatus
    name
    phone
    shouldMFA
    suspended
    userrole
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    userEntryTenantId
    loginPolicies {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        userLoginPolicyLinkLoginPolicyId
        userLoginPolicyLinkUserId
        loginPolicy {
          action
          concurrentUserLimit
          description
          forceUpdateForUnityAgent
          id
          ip
          isDenyAction
          name
          postureId
          source
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          loginPolicyTenantId
          datetime {
            daysOfWeek
            timeZone
            dateRange {
              start
              end
            }
            hours {
              start
              end
            }
          }
          location {
            city
            country
            state
          }
          teams {
            items {
              id
              createdAt
              updatedAt
              teamLoginPolicyLinkLoginPolicyId
              teamLoginPolicyLinkTeamId
            }
            total
            nextToken
          }
          tenant {
            id
            name
          }
          users {
            items {
              id
              createdAt
              updatedAt
              userLoginPolicyLinkLoginPolicyId
              userLoginPolicyLinkUserId
            }
            total
            nextToken
          }
        }
        user {
          _idp_firstName
          _idp_lastName
          _idp_middleName
          _idp_phone
          _magicLink_password
          cognito_username
          forceUserResetPw
          id
          idp
          lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
          lastlogin
          mfaStatus
          name
          phone
          shouldMFA
          suspended
          userrole
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          userEntryTenantId
        }
      }
      total
      nextToken
    }
    roles {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        userRoleLinkRoleId
        userRoleLinkTenantId
        userRoleLinkUserId
      }
      total
      nextToken
    }
    teams {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        userTeamLinkTeamId
        userTeamLinkTeamId
        userTeamLinkUserId
        team {
          description
          externalId
          id
          name
          othermember
          teamEntryOwnerId
          userEntryOwnteamsId
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          teamEntryTenantId
        }
        tenant {
          id
          name
        }
        user {
          _idp_firstName
          _idp_lastName
          _idp_middleName
          _idp_phone
          _magicLink_password
          cognito_username
          forceUserResetPw
          id
          idp
          lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
          lastlogin
          mfaStatus
          name
          phone
          shouldMFA
          suspended
          userrole
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          userEntryTenantId
        }
      }
      total
      nextToken
    }
    tenant {
      id
      name
    }
    unityProfiles {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        userUnityProfileLinkTenantId
        userUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
        userUnityProfileLinkUserId
        tenant {
          id
          name
        }
        unityProfile {
        #   actions
        #   contentLogEnabled
          enableUseSecureDNS
          enforceLatestVersion
          id
          name
          tenantId
          createdAt
          updatedAt
        }
        user {
          _idp_firstName
          _idp_lastName
          _idp_middleName
          _idp_phone
          _magicLink_password
          cognito_username
          forceUserResetPw
          id
          idp
          lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
          lastlogin
          mfaStatus
          name
          phone
          shouldMFA
          suspended
          userrole
          createdAt
          updatedAt
          userEntryTenantId
        }
      }
      total
      nextToken
    }
  }
}

query ListUserEntryByTenantId($id: ID!)  {
    listUserEntryByTenantId(userEntryTenantId: $id,
        filter: { id: { contains: "appaegisqa" } }
    ) {
        items {
            _idp_firstName
            _idp_lastName
            _idp_middleName
            _idp_phone
            _magicLink_password
            cognito_username
            forceUserResetPw
            id
            idp
            lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
            lastlogin
            mfaStatus
            name
            phone
            shouldMFA
            suspended
            syncChromeTime
            userrole
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            userEntryTenantId
        }
    }
}

query ListContentProfiles {
    listContentProfiles {
        nextToken
        total
        items {
            bypassFileSizeExceed
            bypassScanException
            bypassUnSupportFileType
            fileSizeLimit
            id
            matchCount
            name
            piiTypes
            regexPatterns
            supportFileTypes
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            tenantId
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation UpdateUnityProfile($input: CustomUpdateUnityProfileInput!) {
    updateUnityProfile(input: $input) {
        blockAllExtensions
        bypassSecureCheckOnException
        contentControlEAB
        contentControlIds
        default
        enableMalwareScanning
        enableUseSecureDNS
        enforceLatestVersion
        id
        name
        tenantId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        users {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                userUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                userUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
                userUnityProfileLinkUserId
            }
        }
        teams {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                teamUnityProfileLinkTeamId
                teamUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                teamUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
            }
        }
        extensions {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                installConstraint
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                extensionUnityProfileLinkExtensionId
                extensionUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                extensionUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
            }
        }
    }
}

exec: // Calculate the absolute difference between the two timestamps
// Check if the difference is within 18000000 seconds (30 minutes)
test_user_type: 00, // this value is where you define on your folder level, i.e. 00 means admin user and 01 means regular user
tmp_token, // this is only required when you need to execute API on demo or prod
i-= 1; //  decrement i and call myLoop again if i > 0

request.description: This query is to get a list of policies that are applied to the current logged-in user. 1. Open console 2. Run the request 3. A list of polices are printed out as shown below

graphql.query:
mutation ($input: CreateUserDeviceInput!) {
    createLoginPolicy(input: $input) {
        createdAt
        devicePublicKey
        expiredAt
        id
        lastLoginAt
        lastLoginClientIP
        lastLoginGeo
        lock
        loginFor
        mdmComplianceState
        mdmOwnerShip
        mdmProvider
        mdmRegistrationState
        mdmStatus
        mdmStatusUpdatedAt
        onlineStatus
        registerVerified
        updatedAt
        upgradeBrowser
        userDeviceExtensions
        userDeviceMdmProviderId
        userDeviceTenantId
        userDeviceUserId
        websocketServerIp
        device {
            deviceHostname
            deviceId
            deviceMacAddressList
            deviceModel
            deviceName
            deviceSerialNumber
            deviceType
            deviceVersion
        }
        postureCheckResult {
            checks
            postureId
            result
        }
        tenant {
            id
            name
        }
        user {
            id
            name
        }
        userDeviceExtensions {
            items {
                createdAt
                enabled
                extensionID
                extensionName
                id
                installType
                tenantId
                updatedAt
                userDeviceId
                version
                extension {
                    description
                    extensionID
                    icon
                    longDescription
                    name
                    provider
                    version
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                }
                tenant {
                    id
                    name
                }
                userDevice {
                    id
                }
            }
            total
            nextToken
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation CreateSshKeyEntry(
  $input: InsertSshKeyEntryInput!
) {
  insertSshKeyEntry(input: $input) {
          id
          name
          user
          gcpKeyIndex
          isShared
          description
          publicKey
          algorithm
          rules {
            items {
              id
              name
              groups
              users
              tenantId
              sshAuthMethod
              sshUserName
              deriveUsernameFromEmail
              sshcaID
              offline
              certificateLifetime
              createdAt
              updatedAt
            }
            nextToken
          }
          createdAt
          updatedAt
        }
      }

graphql.query:
query ListRegisteredDevices {
    listRegisteredDevices {
        items {
            adDomain
            adGuid
            adminRequired
            block
            deviceModel
            deviceName
            devicePublicKey
            deviceType
            deviceUuid
            id
            isDeviceNameMaintainedByAdmin
            keySpec
            keyType
            macs
            nonce
            registeredAt
            serial
            status
            tpmRequired
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            tenantId
        }
    }
}

{
    "title": "[Content Scanning] Predefined patterns",
    "custom_steps_separated": [
        {
            "content": "1. In the content profile, select `case title` as predefined pattern.
2. Go to the portal to set a policy profile:
    - SaaS App: **Confluence**
    - Allow access
    - Customize permission:
        - All activities, allow
            - Content scanning enabled
            - Match action is deny.
3. Click to save the policy.

",
            "expected": "- should be able to save success."
        },
        {
            "content": "Prepare a local note application that contains the below content (or save the image files on the local).
**p.s. Some patterns need some context to be detected after SOPHOS integration.**

- [Credit Card]
    - **4532 3212 1938 7361** (Visa)
    - **371449635398431** (Amex)

      **Subnet Mask . . . . . . . . . . . : 255.255.255.0**

- [IPv6 Address]

      **options=63<RXCSUM,TXCSUM,TSO4,TSO6>**
      **ether 12:bd:3a:98:60:64**

* define your user data per environment

tmp_token: tmp_token, // this is only required when you need to execute API on demo or prod

mutation ($input: UpsertPolicyV2Input!) {
  upsertPolicyV2(input: $input) {
        accessDeniedMessage
        accessible
        alertLevel
        appCategoryIds
        applyAllUsers
        id
        description
        deviceType
        disablePolicyAt
        disableScreenshot
        documentAttributes
        events
        excludedTeamIds
        excludedUserIds
        id
        inheritOriginalPolicyID
        limitFileContentSizeByte
        limitTextContentSizeByte
        logContent
        name
        resourceType
        scanActionMessage
        scanEnabled
        scanPostAction
        status
        teamIds
        textContentLogContent
        userIds
        webCategoryIds
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        dataMaskingProfileId
        scanProfileId
        tenantId
        applications {
            id
            type
            usage
        }
        customizationGroups {
            events
            limitFileContentSizeByte
            logContent
            permission
            permissionMessage
            scanContent {
                permission
                permissionMessage
                profileId
            }
        }
        customizations {
            event
        }
        dataMaskingProfile {
            id
            name
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            tenantId
        }
        dataMaskingSettings {
            enableRevealByClick
            enabled
            endingRevealNum
            leadingRevealNum
            partialReveal
            regexpRules
            targets
        }
        identitySettings {
            enabled
            pattern
            type
        }
        scanProfile {
            id
            name
            piiTypes
            regexPatterns
            tenantId
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            tenant {
                acountApiPassword
                acountApiUsername
                azureKeyVaults
                createdby
                description
                disableSyncAzure
                disableSyncOkta
                disableSyncPingIdentity
                domain
                enableTrackAllIdentities
                enableVpn
                firstLogin
                groups
                id
                idleTimeoutForEab
                idleTimeoutForPortal
                idpDomain
                loginBanner
                loginPolicyPriority
                magicLinkDuration
                name
                oktaAPIToken
                paidSubscriptionStartAt
                paidUserQuota
                policyDefaultAccessPermission
                policyV2DatabaseResourcePriority
                policyV2KubernetesResourcePriority
                policyV2RdpResourcePriority
                policyV2SharedFileResourcePriority
                policyV2SshResourcePriority
                policyV2TcpResourcePriority
                policyV2WebResourcePriority
                privacyNoticesLink
                sessRecordingExpire
                syncAzureApps
                syncAzureTime
                syncOktaApps
                syncOktaTime
                termOfUseLink
                vpnCidr
                vpnDns
                vpnServerIp
                webClientId
                tenanttype
                createdAt
                updatedAt
            }
        }
        tenant {
            id
            name
        }
        transitionSettings {
            applyAfterMS
            enabled
            permission
        }
        watermarkSettings {
            enabled
            message
        }
    }
}

request.description: This query is to get a list of policies that are applied to the current logged-in user. 1. Open console 2. Run the request 3. A list of polices are printed out as shown below

graphql.query:
mutation ($input: UpsertPolicyV2Input!) {
  upsertPolicyV2(input: $input) {
        accessible
        alertLevel
        appCategoryIds
        # appIds
        applyAllUsers
        clipboardControl
        contentSharingTags
        description
        deviceType
        disablePolicyAt
        disableScreenshot
        documentAttributes
        events
        excludedTeamIds
        excludedUserIds
        fileSharingControl
        id
        inheritOriginalPolicyID
        limitFileContentSizeByte
        limitTextContentSizeByte
        logContent
        name
        # permission
        # permissionMessage
        resourceType
        scanActionMessage
        scanEnabled
        scanPostAction
        status
        teamIds
        textContentLogContent
        userIds
        webCategoryIds
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        scanProfileId
        tenantId
        customizationGroups {
            clipboardControl
            contentSharingTags
            events
            fileSharingControl
            limitFileContentSizeByte
            logContent
            permission
            permissionMessage
            scanContent {
                permission
                permissionMessage
                profileId
            }
        }
        customizations {
            event
            actions {
                name
            }
        }
        dataMaskingSettings {
            enableRevealByClick
            enabled
            endingRevealNum
            leadingRevealNum
            partialReveal
            regexpRules
            targets
        }
        identitySettings {
            enabled
            pattern
            type
        }
        scanProfile {
            id
            name
            piiTypes
            regexPatterns
            createdAt
            updatedAt
            tenantId
            tenant {
                acountApiPassword
                acountApiUsername
                azureKeyVaults
                createdby
                description
                disableSyncAzure
                disableSyncOkta
                disableSyncPingIdentity
                domain
                enableTrackAllIdentities
                enableVpn
                firstLogin
                groups
                id
                idleTimeoutForEab
                idleTimeoutForPortal
                idpDomain
                loginBanner
                loginPolicyPriority
                magicLinkDuration
                name
                oktaAPIToken
                paidSubscriptionStartAt
                paidUserQuota
                policyDefaultAccessPermission
                policyV2DatabaseResourcePriority
                policyV2KubernetesResourcePriority
                policyV2RdpResourcePriority
                policyV2SharedFileResourcePriority
                policyV2SshResourcePriority
                policyV2TcpResourcePriority
                policyV2WebResourcePriority
                privacyNoticesLink
                sessRecordingExpire
                syncAzureApps
                syncAzureTime
                syncOktaApps
                syncOktaTime
                syncPingIdApps
                syncPingIdTime
                termOfUseLink
                vpnCidr
                vpnDns
                vpnServerIp
                webClientId
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                tenanttype
                azureConnector {
                    clientId
                    crt
                    fingerprint
                    key
                    tenantId
                }
                certificateAuthorities {
                    caName
                    caType
                    certificateValue
                    cryptoInfo
                    id
                    privateKeyValue
                    publicKeyValue
                    subject
                    validTTL
                }
                defaultLoginPolicy {
                    action
                    forceUpdateForEAB
                    isDenyAction
                    postureId
                }
                featureToggle {
                    bypassPolicyV2
                    forceLaunchFromEAB
                }
                gcpconnectors {
                    nextToken
                    total
                    items {
                        id
                        keyjson
                        name
                        private_key_id
                        project_id
                        createdAt
                        updatedAt
                        gCPconnectorTenantId
                    }
                }
                keymanagements {
                    awsCredentialId
                    awsRegion
                    azureActiveAt
                    azureExpireAt
                    azureKeyAlg
                    hiddenResourceID
                    id
                    kmsName
                    kmsType
                    networkID
                    vaultClusterName
                    vaultDatabaseCredentialPath
                    vaultDynScript
                    vaultEnableDyn
                    vaultHost
                    vaultLoginPath
                    vaultNamespace
                    vaultRoleID
                    vaultSecretID
                    vaultServerConnectionStatus
                    vaultServerVersion
                    vaultSignHostCAPath
                    vaultSignPath
                    vaultTriggerDynAccount
                    vaultTriggerDynKey
                    vaultTriggerDynPath
                }
                networks {
                    nextToken
                    total
                    items {
                        AgentToken
                        description
                        devicemgmt
                        id
                        name
                        networkTag
                        networkType
                        nwcidr
                        validationCode
                        vpcid
                        vpnRoutes
                        createdAt
                        updatedAt
                        networkEntryTenantId
                        tenant {
                            acountApiPassword
                            acountApiUsername
                            azureKeyVaults
                            createdby
                            description
                            disableSyncAzure
                            disableSyncOkta
                            disableSyncPingIdentity
                            domain
                            enableTrackAllIdentities
                            enableVpn
                            firstLogin
                            groups
                            id
                            idleTimeoutForEab
                            idleTimeoutForPortal
                            idpDomain
                            loginBanner
                            loginPolicyPriority
                            magicLinkDuration
                            name
                            oktaAPIToken
                            paidSubscriptionStartAt
                            paidUserQuota
                            policyDefaultAccessPermission
                            policyV2DatabaseResourcePriority
                            policyV2KubernetesResourcePriority
                            policyV2RdpResourcePriority
                            policyV2SharedFileResourcePriority
                            policyV2SshResourcePriority
                            policyV2TcpResourcePriority
                            policyV2WebResourcePriority
                            privacyNoticesLink
                            sessRecordingExpire
                            syncAzureApps
                            syncAzureTime
                            syncOktaApps
                            syncOktaTime
                            syncPingIdApps
                            syncPingIdTime
                            termOfUseLink
                            vpnCidr
                            vpnDns
                            vpnServerIp
                            webClientId
                            createdAt
                            updatedAt
                            tenanttype
                        }
                        serviceedge {
                            nextToken
                            total
                        }
                        resource {
                            nextToken
                            total
                            items {
                                allowSharing
                                allowedUrls
                                category
                                connectStatus
                                deriveUsernameFromEmail
                                description
                                enableMultiMonitorSupport
                                enableRecording
                                hostKeyCA
                                hostKeyVerification
                                iconUrl
                                id
                                incognito
                                isTempApp
                                isolation
                                kubeGroup
                                latency
                                oktaID
                                passwordVaultingAssignmentType
                                permittedActions
                                resname
                                resourcetype
                                samlProxyEnabled
                                samlProxyFromAppACSURL
                                samlProxyFromAppCertificate
                                samlProxyFromAppEntityID
                                samlProxyFromIdPCertificate
                                samlProxyFromIdPEntityID
                                samlProxyFromIdPSSOURL
                                samlProxyToAppCertificate
                                samlProxyToAppEntityID
                                samlProxyToAppMetadata
                                samlProxyToAppSSOURL
                                samlProxyToIdPACSURL
                                samlProxyToIdPEntityID
                                samlProxyToIdPMetadata
                                sshcaID
                                status
                                waterMarkEnabled
                                waterMarkText
                                createdAt
                                updatedAt
                                aclEntryId
                                monitorPolicyEntryId
                                resourceEntryNetworkId
                                resourceEntryPolicyId
                                resourceEntrySourceNetworkId
                                sshAuthProfileId
                                resourceEntrySshProfileId
                                resourceEntryTenantId
                                appsetting {
                                    apphost
                                    appinternalurl
                                    appport
                                    appprotocol
                                    azureAppId
                                    certificateLifetime
                                    dbName
                                    localport
                                    offline
                                    sharedFolder
                                    source
                                    sourceproxyport
                                    sshAuthMethod
                                    sshPrivateKey
                                    sshUserName
                                    targetprotocol
                                    vaultServerId
                                }
                                gcpfilter {
                                    instance
                                    networktags
                                    project
                                    vpcname
                                }
                                network {
                                    AgentToken
                                    description
                                    devicemgmt
                                    id
                                    name
                                    networkTag
                                    networkType
                                    nwcidr
                                    validationCode
                                    vpcid
                                    vpnRoutes
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                    networkEntryTenantId
                                    proxyConfig {
                                        password
                                        proxyAddr
                                        username
                                    }
                                }
                                monitorPolicy {
                                    id
                                    name
                                    tenantEntryId
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                }
                                policy {
                                    contentLogEnabled
                                    default
                                    description
                                    id
                                    name
                                    policyEntryTenantId
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                }
                                samlProxyExtraSetting {
                                    customizedRelayState
                                }
                                sshProfile {
                                    id
                                    name
                                    sshProfileTenantId
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                }
                                sshAuthProfile {
                                    id
                                    name
                                    tenantId
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                }
                                sourceNetwork {
                                    AgentToken
                                    description
                                    devicemgmt
                                    id
                                    name
                                    networkTag
                                    networkType
                                    nwcidr
                                    validationCode
                                    vpcid
                                    vpnRoutes
                                    createdAt
                                    updatedAt
                                    networkEntryTenantId
                                }
                            }
                        }
                        proxyConfig {
                            password
                            proxyAddr
                            username
                        }
                    }
                }
                subscriptionHistory {
                    customName
                    customUserQuota
                    expirationDate
                    startDate
                }
                sku {
                    name
                    skuType
                    createdAt
                    updatedAt
                }
                webhookConfigs {
                    nextToken
                    total
                    items {
                        channelType
                        enabled
                        id
                        createdAt
                        updatedAt
                        webhookConfigEntryTenantId
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        tenant {
            id
        }
    }
}

graphql.query:
mutation UpdateUnityProfile($input: CustomUpdateUnityProfileInput!) {
    updateUnityProfile(input: $input) {
        blockAllExtensions
        bypassSecureCheckOnException
        contentControlEAB
        contentControlIds
        default
        enableMalwareScanning
        enableUseSecureDNS
        enforceLatestVersion
        id
        name
        tenantId
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        users {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                userUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                userUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
                userUnityProfileLinkUserId
            }
        }
        teams {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                teamUnityProfileLinkTeamId
                teamUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                teamUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
            }
        }
        extensions {
            nextToken
            total
            items {
                id
                installConstraint
                createdAt
                updatedAt
                extensionUnityProfileLinkExtensionId
                extensionUnityProfileLinkTenantId
                extensionUnityProfileLinkUnityProfileId
            }
        }
    }
}

exec: // Calculate the absolute difference between the two timestamps
// Check if the difference is within 18000000 seconds (30 minutes)
test_user_type: 00, // this value is where you define on your folder level, i.e. 00 means admin user and 01 means regular user
tmp_token, // this is only required when you need to execute API on demo or prod
i-= 1; //  decrement i and call myLoop again if i > 0
* define your data such as region, client_id and password per environment
* client_id may change depending on your user, you may update it accordingly
* define your user data per environment
* you can define your own test_user_type as the key:

graphql.query:
query GetUserEntry($id: ID!) {
  getUserEntry(id: $id) {
    id
    tenant {
      id

      }

      }
      createdby
      groups
      webClientId
      idpDomain
      idpProvider {
        type
        name
        displayName
        iconUrl
        defaultRoleId
        enabled
        oktaDomainUrl
        samlMetaDataID
        advanced
      }
      tenanttype
      name
      description
      createdAt
      firstLogin
      acountApiUsername
      acountApiPassword
      certificateAuthorities {
        id
        caName
        caType
        privateKeyValue
        publicKeyValue
        certificateValue
        validTTL
        subject
        cryptoInfo
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
      keymanagements {
        id
        kmsName
        kmsType
        networkID
        hiddenResourceID
        vaultHost
        vaultRoleID
        vaultSecretID
        vaultLoginPath
        vaultSignPath
        vaultSignHostCAPath
        vaultDatabaseCredentialPath
        vaultNamespace
        vaultEnableDyn
        vaultTriggerDynPath
        vaultTriggerDynKey
        vaultTriggerDynAccount
        vaultDynScript
        vaultServerConnectionStatus
        vaultServerVersion
        vaultClusterName
        azureKeyAlg
        azureActiveAt
        azureExpireAt
        awsCredentialId
        awsRegion
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
      webhookConfigs {
        nextToken
      }
      privacyNoticesLink
      termOfUseLink
      loginBanner
      sku {
        createdAt
        updatedAt
        skuType
        name
        capacity
      }
      paidUserQuota
      paidSubscriptionStartAt
      idleTimeoutForPortal
      idleTimeoutForEab
      vpnCidr
      vpnServerIp
      vpnDns
      enableVpn
      azureConnector {
        tenantId
        clientId
        crt
        key
        fingerprint
      }
      azureKeyVaults
      sessRecordingExpire
      magicLinkDuration
      syncAzureApps
      syncAzureTime
      disableSyncAzure
      syncOktaApps
      syncOktaTime
      disableSyncOkta
      dedicateIpConfig {
        enable
        tenantSHA1
      }
      oktaAPIToken
      updatedAt
    }
    userEntryTenantId
    name
    cognito_username
    userrole
    phone
    lastlogin
    teams {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
      nextToken
    }
    idp
    roles {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
      nextToken
    }
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    suspended
    shouldMFA
    mfaStatus
    skipSignUpVerificationCheckedCode
    skipSignUpVerification
    lastAppAlertReadTimestamp
    _idp_firstName
    _idp_lastName
    _idp_middleName
    _idp_phone
    _magicLink_password
    forceUserResetPw
    loginPolicies {
      items {
        id
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
      nextToken
    }
  }
}

exec: * related test uility functions should be defined here
* For query getPolicyV2, getting appIds and teamIds from response
* to construct filter objects based on Ids and store them to collection variables respectively
* The filter object is used for queries listResourceEntries (Apps info) and listTeamEntries (Gropus info)
console.log(`all appIds of the policy [${jsonData.name}] are in length ${appIds.length}: ${appIds}`)
console.log(`all teamIds of the policy [${jsonData.name}] are in length ${teamIds.length}: ${teamIds}`)
// this is going to be used by listResourceEntries as a filter
// this is going to be used by listTeamEntries as a filter
const {items, keyToCheck, id, pm, filterString = 'auto-'} = options;
* get the id_token from AWS cognito server and
* set the token_id and user to postman collection variables named "id_token" and "portal_user"
* Due to the issue AWS Cognito Authentication USER_PASSWORD_AUTH flow not enabled for this client
* caused by settings on AWS is not enabled on demo & prod,
* The temp solution is copy the id_token from web console and paste it.
* This function is to get id_token of the copied authorization string should be trimmed/processed
if (!token_from_web) throw Error('Please pass the token from web, the string format should be ["Authentication": "your token string"]');
* Some useful utility functions that can be reused throught the requests
* Get current Unix timestamp in milliseconds
* Get timestamp 30 seconds in the future
* You can use any of these:
now = now.add(options.value, options.unit); // Use negative value for subtraction
// Calculate the absolute difference between the two timestamps
// Check if the difference is within 18000000 seconds (30 minutes)
// Generate UUID using Postman built-in function
// Set the UUID as an environment or global variable (optional)
